headlines.description: Arsenal romped to a 5-0 win against Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sunday, with Granit Xhaka bagging two of the goals in what is expected to be his final game of an incident-packed seven years at the club.
headlines.shortLinkText: Xhaka takes bow with brace in Arsenal rout

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Aston Villa

headlines.description: Aston Villa secured a return to Europe in the Conference League next season with a 2-1 home win over Brighton & Hove Albion as goals from Douglas Luiz and Ollie Watkins on Sunday saw them end the Premier League campaign in seventh place.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aston Villa beat Brighton to seal European place

headlines.description: A late goal from Ethan Pinnock earned Brentford a 1-0 win over Premier League champions Manchester City in their final game of the season on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford beat champions City but miss out on Europe

headlines.description: Anthony Gordon's first goal for Champions League-bound Newcastle United earned them a final Premier League point in a 1-1 draw at Chelsea on Sunday to ensure the home side's chaotic season ended with a whimper.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle draw with Chelsea on final matchday

headlines.description: Crystal Palace came back from a goal down to earn a 1-1 home draw with Nottingham Forest in both sides' final games of the Premier League season on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace held as Forest claim rare away point in draw

headlines.description: Everton will extend their unbroken 69-year stay in the English top flight as midfielder Abdoulaye Doucoure's stunning strike earned them a 1-0 victory over Bournemouth as they avoided relegation on the final day of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Doucoure stunner ensures Everton's PL survival

headlines.description: Leeds United were relegated from the Premier League after losing 4-1 at home to Tottenham at Elland Road in the season finale on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs' Kane nets 30th PL goal as Leeds go down

events.name: West Ham United at Leicester City

headlines.description: Harvey Barnes struck a superb first-half goal but Leicester City were still relegated from the Premier League despite a 2-1 win over West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester relegated despite win over West Ham

headlines.description: Jadon Sancho and Bruno Fernandes got on the scoresheet as Manchester United came from behind to claim a 2-1 home win over Fulham on Sunday and end their Premier League campaign on a high.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fernandes winner sees Man United finish third

headlines.description: Liverpool were held to a barnstorming 4-4 draw at relegated Southampton in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool, Southampton draw in eight-goal thriller as Roberto Firmino bids farewell
